captions.text:
Ever since I was a small kid,
I ve been curious to discover new things.
Because discovery makes life more exciting.

I didn t want to do the same things again
and again

I always had the desire to seek out and find
something different.

I started travelling because
I felt such a strong curiosity about life.

So far I have travelled to 151 countries in
6 continents.

It will be the 500th airport where I m going
to land.

I have always been inspired by people who
were devoted to discover new things.

Different languages, cultures, stories and
legends.

My 500th airport will be Iğdır in north-eastern
Turkey.

From here you can easily reach one of the
tallest mountains in the region.
One of the greatest legends in history.
Do you think Noah s Ark could be here?

title: 500th Airport: The story of a man devoted to exploring new worlds

comments.text:
Muy emocionante! Me he despertado esta mañana de domingo con lágrimas en 
los ojos al ver el comercial. Finalmente alguien interpreta a la perfección 
lo que un viajero siente cada día de su vida. El deseo de conocer, de 
vivir, de experimentar, de interpretar, nuevas realidades.
Muy bueno! Andras te esperamos en Argentina, y si lo deseas, sería un 
placer para mi invitarte a conocer algo más de nuestro país.
teşekkür ederim! ﻿
